item.title: Burnt out road sign, 19th July
item.description:
Road sign 'Paroma Road' was burnt away about two years ago. On the junction of the lower end of Ripley Road and the corner of Paroma Road. Needs replacing at some stage, please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Paroma Road, Lower Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Littering in the play area, 19th July
item.description:
I’ve come here for 3 years with my children and every single time there’s litter everywhere around the playground - not just the enclosed area, but around the swings, benches etc. i never seen it clean - can you please fix this so it’s cleaned regularly

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lavington Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two flytipped mattresses, 19th July
item.description:
Two mattresses - reported twice already. I increasingly fear Westminster’s ‘Report.it’ AI-driven system doesn’t actually link to any service… But prove me wrong…

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 377-381, Euston Road, Fitzrovia, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 1 abandoned bike, 19th July
item.description:
Another abandoned human forest bike by another moron who doesn’t understand what a pavement is for rather than leaving the bike in the middle of the pavement they are supposed to use a bay surprisingly there is a bay about 50 m away abandoned the scheme. It’s clearly not working.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lavington Street, Southwark, London
